channel.title: Platform Research And Development - Aziz Kurbanov

item.title: The Math Teacher's Cabin
item.description:
An Ode to a Distinguished Teacher of the Republic of Uzbekistan

Orifjon Bakirov

The Setting: San Francisco

Eleven years ago. Autumn sun rays were shyly sketching the edges of large, puffy, white clouds. San Francisco's resident wind was also a strong presence, making it the perfect weather for a light â€¦
item.dc:creator: Aziz Kurbanov

item.title: AQE
item.description:
MLOps-driven agentic platform orchestrating distributed AI agents for web state capture, LLM-powered change detection, and RAG-enabled Playwright test generation. Achieves reproducible end-to-end test automation for complex web applications.

Repository: sqe/AQE
item.dc:creator: Aziz Kurbanov

item.title: esddns
item.description:
Enterprise-scale DNS management and distributed naming service. Provides reliable, scalable DNS resolution with support for complex network topologies and multi-tenant environments.

Repository: sqe/esddns
item.dc:creator: Aziz Kurbanov

item.title: fizmatmod
item.description:
Physics and mathematical modeling library. Enables computational simulation of physical systems, providing tools for numerical analysis and physics-based modeling in scientific computing applications.

Repository: sqe/fizmatmod
item.dc:creator: Aziz Kurbanov

item.title: robotics-k8s-infra
item.description:
Production-grade platform for cloud/edge robotics integration. Features KubeEdge for edge computing, ROS2 middleware, ArgoCD for GitOps deployment, multi-domain DDS for distributed systems, eBPF-based networking with Cilium for UDP multicast discovery, CLI tools for edge node simulation and lifecycle management, and real-time metrics collection.

Repository: sqe/robotics-k8s-infra
item.dc:creator: Aziz Kurbanov

item.title: urlstatus
item.description:
Distributed URL status monitoring and health-check service. Provides real-time endpoint monitoring, status aggregation, and alerting capabilities for infrastructure and service health tracking across heterogeneous environments.

Repository: sqe/urlstatus
item.dc:creator: Aziz Kurbanov
